Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.commands

Class SelectColumnCommand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.commands.SelectColumnCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class SelectColumnCommand extends Object implements Command
The SelectColumnCommand class represents a command for selecting a column of the player's shelf where the selected items will be placed

      public void execute() throws FullColumnException
      Invokes all methods to ask the shelf's column, to check if it is valid and to save it in an Integer List
